pkgmetadata.longdescription: Unbundled GPS daemon and library to support USB and serial GPS devices and various GPS/mapping clients, such as GPSDrive, kismet, and pygps.

use.flag: Enable support for Garmin simple text protocol
Add gpsd user for daemon privileges.
Reduced install set, limited number of devices and client, no X deps
Enable net-misc/ntp shared memory interface and PPS kernel support for GPS time
Enable udev rules for PL2303 USB-serial converter
Enable True North Technologies digital compass support
